title: First Programming Language
completedHtml:
Your first language should be:

TypeScript or Python

completedHtmlOnCondition.expression: {challenges} = 'Bring it on!' and {hipster} anyof ['No,  what is hipster?', 'No'] and {develop} anyof ['A robot', 'Carpal tunnel syndrome']

{challenges} anyof ['Yes', 'Bring it on!'] and {hipster} anyof ['Yes, I have eaten an artisanal burger from a food truck', 'Yes, I have a couple of vinyl records '] and {develop} anyof ['A robot', 'Carpal tunnel syndrome', 'Game']

{Why programming} = 'To make money' and {hipster} anyof ['Yes, I have eaten an artisanal burger from a food truck', 'Yes, I have a couple of vinyl records '] and {develop} anyof ['Website', 'A robot']

elements.name: intro
elements.html:
Hello fellow programmer, my name is Evgeny and this test is exclusivly for my maillist subscribers :)

This test will help you to choose the right first programming language for you to learn.

Bear in mind that all languages here are very good for beginners and no matter what you chose you probably will know all of them at some point of your career, so don't feel like if you chose one you will miss out on others.

Please click on 'Start Test' button when you are ready.

elements.name: Why programming
elements.title: Why do you want to learn programming?
choices: I want to make an impact
Because clack clack clack.... I am in!
